packageJson.name: cathedral-of-circuits
packageJson.description: Lightweight sacred technology monorepo - runs entirely on free hosting

scripts.clean: turbo run clean && rm -rf node_modules .turbo dist

packageJson.name: @bekalah/cathedral-monorepo
packageJson.description: Cathedral of Circuits - Living Grimoire Engine with 22 Tradition Masters & Fusion Kink

scripts.legacy-build: pnpm -C packages/data build && pnpm run build:packages && pnpm -C apps/web build
scripts.build:packages: tsc -b packages/brain packages/soul packages/labs packages/shared packages/crystals packages/synth
scripts.alpha-omega: echo 'üé® Opening Alpha et Omega visualization...' && open circuitum99-alpha-et-omega.html
scripts.99-gates: pnpm -C packages/circuitum99 alpha && pnpm -C packages/circuitum99 mystery && pnpm -C packages/circuitum99 omega
scripts.ecosystem-health: pnpm run validate-datasets && echo 'üéâ All mystical systems healthy!'
scripts.failcheck: pnpm run check-integrity || echo '‚ùå Issues found - check dashboard for details'

packageJson.author: Rebecca Respawn <bekalah@users.noreply.github.com>
